reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: AgroBIG II: Programme for Agro-Business Induced Growth in the Amhara National Regional State second phase
AgroBIG II: Tuki maatalousvetoiselle talouskasvulle Amharassa toinen vaihe

description.narrative: The project is the second phase of AgroBIG (Programme for Agro-Business Induced Growth in the Amhara National Regional State) that supports rural economic development. The project is implemented in the Amhara National Regional State of Ethiopia. The pr oject duration was originally 2021-2021 but one year extension is needed untill December 2022. AgroBIG II aims to reduce poverty and inequalities by supporting the development of value chains so that the livelihoods of the rural population participating in the project will improve. The aimed impact of the project is that agriculture provides decent and sustainable livelihood and increased food security to its beneficiaries in rural Amhara regional state. Two outcomes contribute to the impact of the Program me and the first outcome needs to be achieved before the second can be achieved. They are 1. The expected outputs are:1: Value chain actors? access to finance and financial services is improved. 2: Agricultural farm productivity in selected crops is increa sed. 3: Cooperatives? effectiveness as value chain actors is increased and their economical sustainability is improved and 4 MSMEs and women and youth have skills and resources to earn their income from agriculture-based activities. AgroBIG II activities and results such as strengthened links to markets increased values of the products of the agricultural chains and creation of jobs have benefitted over 240 000 farmers and their family members. Thousands of people have received training in the project. T he loan fund for specifically women and youth have provided over 4000 loans.The project has been affected to some extent by COVID and some of its Northern areas has been affected by violence. Although some activities have been delayed the project implement ing model and its objectives have not changed. It is proposed that one year extension for the project untill 2022 and additional 690 000 euros for the project is accepted. The additinal funding will be directed to Niras Finland Oy who implements technical support fo the project. The original budget for the project is 10.3 million euros including Finland'd support of 9.4 million euros to which the 690 000 would be hence added.

tag.narrative: Generating jobs, livelihood opportunities and well-being in a developing country is the main prio rity area in this activity
Improving food security, access to water and sustainability is the secondary priority area in t his activity
Strengthening of the rights and status of women and girls is a secondary priority area in this activity
